languages.text: "Хорошая была бы присказка, если бы не местные нравы. Готов поспорить, между пытками и казнью на Тассере проходит не меньше пяти смены блюд с музыкой".

traits.locale_text: "Я запомню этот совет, господин губернатор. Мало ли... пригодится".

languages.text: "It would be a good adage if not for the local mores. I bet there are at least five course changes between torture and execution on Thassera, and with music."
languages.original_text: "Хорошая была бы присказка, если бы не местные нравы. Готов поспорить, между пытками и казнью на Тассере проходит не меньше пяти смены блюд с музыкой".

traits.locale_text: "It would be a good adage if it were not for the local mores. I bet there are at least five course changes between torture and execution on Thassera, and with music."
"It would be a good adage if it were not for the local mores. I bet there are at least five course changes between torture and execution on Thassera, and with music."

"It would be a good adage if not for the local mores. I bet there are at least five course changes between torture and execution on Thassera, and with music."

languages.text: “如果不是因为当地的习俗，这句格言本该很有道理。我敢打赌，塔瑟拉的酷刑与处决至少还会重演五次，而且每次都会载歌载舞。”
languages.original_text: "It would be a good adage if not for the local mores. I bet there are at least five course changes between torture and execution on Thassera, and with music."

traits.locale_text: “如果不是因为当地的习俗，这句格言本该很有道理。我敢打赌，塔瑟拉的酷刑与处决至少还会重演五次，而且每次都会载歌载舞。”

languages.text: «Me parecería un buen proverbio de no ser por las costumbres locales. Seguro que en Thassera se sirven al menos cinco platos entre la tortura y la ejecución, y todos con acompañamiento musical».
languages.original_text: "It would be a good adage if not for the local mores. I bet there are at least five course changes between torture and execution on Thassera, and with music."

traits.locale_text: «Me parecería un buen proverbio de no ser por las costumbres locales. Seguro que en Thassera se sirven al menos cinco platos entre la tortura y la ejecución, y todos con acompañamiento musical».

languages.text: "Yerel gelenekler olmasa iyi bir özdeyiş olurdu. Eminim Thassera'da işkence ile idam arasında en az beş çeşit yemek verilip müzik dinleniyordur."
languages.original_text: "It would be a good adage if not for the local mores. I bet there are at least five course changes between torture and execution on Thassera, and with music."

traits.locale_text: "Yerel gelenekler olmasa iyi bir özdeyiş olurdu. Eminim Thassera'da işkence ile idam arasında en az beş çeşit yemek verilip müzik dinleniyordur."

languages.text: 「地域的な慣習がなかったら、素晴らしいことわざだろう。タッセーラには、音楽も合わせて拷問と処刑の間に少なくとも5つのコース変換があることだろう」
languages.original_text: "It would be a good adage if not for the local mores. I bet there are at least five course changes between torture and execution on Thassera, and with music."

traits.locale_text: 「地域的な慣習がなかったら、素晴らしいことわざだろう。タッセーラには、音楽も合わせて拷問と処刑の間に少なくとも5つのコース変換があることだろう」

languages.text: « Ce serait un bon adage, mais c'est sans compter sur les mœurs locales. Sur Thassera, je serais prêt à parier qu'ils mangent au moins cinq plats différents entre la torture et l'exécution, et le tout en musique. »
languages.original_text: "It would be a good adage if not for the local mores. I bet there are at least five course changes between torture and execution on Thassera, and with music."

traits.locale_text: « Ce serait un bon adage, mais c'est sans compter sur les mœurs locales. Sur Thassera, je serais prêt à parier qu'ils mangent au moins cinq plats différents entre la torture et l'exécution, et le tout en musique. »

languages.text: "Ein gutes Sprichwort, wären da nicht die örtlichen Sitten. Auf Thassera gibt es zwischen der Folter und der Hinrichtung garantiert fünf Zwischengänge, mit Musik."
languages.original_text: "It would be a good adage if not for the local mores. I bet there are at least five course changes between torture and execution on Thassera, and with music."

traits.locale_text: "Ein gutes Sprichwort, wären da nicht die örtlichen Sitten. Auf Thassera gibt es zwischen der Folter und der Hinrichtung garantiert fünf Zwischengänge, mit Musik."
